name: I Lost My Heart
description:
Chris from GearEight Games
Lead Artist, Game Designer

Chang Zhen / akirassasin
Gameplay and VFX Programmer, Technical Designer

Ng Hwa Kint
Programmer, Sound Design

Aidan from Metronomik
One-Night Advisor for Game Design

Our submission for Global Game Jam 2019 - a narrative platformer.

Admittedly, we may have missed the theme (What Home Means To You?) by a wide arc, and also got pincer-attacked by scope creep and lack of concrete design.

However, there's a fair lot of art assets made by Chris that have yet to seen the light of day. I would definitely return to work on it and give it closure - it deserves that much!

SFX credits can be found in the game jam page.

AD / left and right arrow keys to move. Space to jump. E to interact.
